keyword: how many calories in an in n out cheeseburger
title: How Many Calories in an In-N-Out Cheeseburger?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in an In-N-Out cheeseburger, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and quick variations for your meal tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in an In-N-Out Cheeseburger?
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out cheeseburger: grilled beef patty, American cheese, sesame seed bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact preparation, and customizations. Values based on official In-N-Out data; check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: An In-N-Out cheeseburger contains about 480 calories with 20 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Animal style (extra spread, grilled onions, mustard, pickles)
Protein style (wrapped in lettuce, no bun)

faqs.q: How many calories are in an In-N-Out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 calories for the standard version.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in an In-N-Out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: About 20 g of protein per cheeseburger.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in an In-N-Out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Around 940 mg of sodium, mostly from the spread and bun.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out cheeseburgers high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, with 27 g total fat including 11 g saturated fat from the patty and cheese.

faqs.q: How do customizations affect calories in an In-N-Out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Options like animal style add ~190 kcal; protein style (no bun) subtracts ~240 kcal.
